caseTitle: Board of Governors of Federal Reserve System v. First Lincolnwood Corporation
issue: mergers

caseTitle: United States v. Naftalin
issue: federal or state regulation of securities

caseTitle: Perrin v. United States
issue: statutory construction of criminal laws: Travel Act, 18 USC 1952

caseTitle: Chiarella v. United States
issue: statutory construction of criminal laws: financial (other than in fraud or internal revenue)

caseTitle: Roberts v. United States
issue: self-incrimination (other than as pertains to Miranda or immunity from prosecution)

caseTitle: United States v. California
issue: Submerged Lands Act (cf. federal-state ownership dispute)

caseTitle: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System v. Investment Company Institute
issue: federal or state regulation of securities

caseTitle: Rubin v. United States
issue: statutory construction of criminal laws: false statements (cf. statutory construction of criminal laws: perjury)

caseTitle: CBS, Inc. v. Federal Communications Commission
issue: federal and some few state regulation of public utilities regulation: radio and television (cf. cable television)

caseTitle: Arizona v. Maricopa County Medical Society
issue: antitrust (except in the context of mergers and union antitrust)

caseTitle: Edgar v. MITE Corporation
issue: state or local government regulation, especially of business (cf. federal pre-emption of state court jurisdiction, federal pre-emption of state legislation or regulation)

caseTitle: American Society of Mechanical Engineers, Inc. v. Hydrolevel Corporation
issue: antitrust (except in the context of mergers and union antitrust)

caseTitle: Fidelity Federal Savings & Loan Association v. De la Cuesta
issue: federal pre-emption of state legislation or regulation. cf. state regulation of business. rarely involves union activity. Does not involve constitutional interpretation unless the Court says it does.

caseTitle: Falls City Industries, Inc. v. Vanco Beverage, Inc.
issue: antitrust (except in the context of mergers and union antitrust)

caseTitle: Keeton v. Hustler Magazine, Inc.
issue: due process: jurisdiction (jurisdiction over non-resident litigants)

caseTitle: Northeast Bancorp, Inc. v. Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System
issue: mergers

caseTitle: American Trucking Associations, Inc. v. Scheiner
issue: state or local government tax

caseTitle: Virginia Bankshares, Inc.  v. Sandberg
issue: federal or state regulation of securities

caseTitle: Hartford Fire Insurance Company v. California
issue: antitrust (except in the context of mergers and union antitrust)

caseTitle: Amchem Products, Inc. v. Windsor
issue: Federal Rules of Civil Procedure including Supreme Court Rules, application of the Federal Rules of Evidence, Federal Rules of Appellate Procedure in civil litigation, Circuit Court Rules, and state rules and admiralty rules

caseTitle: Chevron U.S.A., Inc. v. Echazabal
issue: handicapped, rights of: under Rehabilitation, Americans with Disabilities Act, and related statutes

caseTitle: Sprietsma v. Mercury Marine
issue: federal pre-emption of state court jurisdiction

caseTitle: F. Hoffman-LaRoche, Ltd. v. Empagran S.A.
issue: antitrust (except in the context of mergers and union antitrust)

caseTitle: Ballard v. Commissioner of Internal Revenue
issue: judicial review of administrative agency's or administrative official's actions and procedures

caseTitle: Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC v. Billing
issue: antitrust (except in the context of mergers and union antitrust)

caseTitle: Stoneridge Investment Partners, LLC v. Scientific-Atlanta, Inc.
issue: federal or state regulation of securities

caseTitle: Philip Morris USA Inc. v. Williams
issue: no merits: writ improvidently granted

caseTitle: Mayo Collaborative Services v. Prometheus Laboratories, Inc.
